aarthika sanwardhana niyojya amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahatha samanga eeye (5) sakachchawak kala wanajiwi niladhari wruththiya samithi niyojithayo siya wruththiya samithi kriyamargaya thawakalikawa nathara kirimata thiranaya kalaha.me dinawala akurata wada kirime wruththiya samithi kriyamargayaka niratha wanajiwi niladhari sangam pramukha rajaye baladharin athara me sakachchawa eeye sarthaka prathipala athkara demin awasan wu bawa niyojya amathiwaraya pawasuweya.labana 19 wanida watup komisame niladharin samanga siya wruththiya samithi illim pilibanda kathika kirimata thiranaya wiya.
